description:
More than just another pair of jeans. Kühl has worked their magic on the classic jean, and the results are comfy. From their dynamic patterning to their technical denim blend, the Klassik Pants take what we love about jeans, just made better.

  • Made from a heavyweight technical denim that uses a blend of materials to balance, comfort, stretch, and durability
  • Classic 5-pocket layout means you can keep your things exactly where you like to keep them
  • Drop-in phone pocket
  • Standard fit wears exactly like you want them too. If you like a relaxed fit, Kuhl suggests sizing up
name: Kuhl Denim Klassik Pants - Men's
